title.narrative: The Joint Executive Program to Support the Humanitarian Response Plan in Yemen 2020 Preparedness and Planning for Responding COVID-19 Pandemic Phase II

description.narrative: Supporting the health sector in the Republic of Yemen to counter the emerging of COVID-19

1- Training of medical personnel to deal with the pandemic 2- Increase the hospital bed capacity to receive infected cases
3. Increase the clinical capacity in the intensive care departments 4. Providing ventilators, intensive care devices and emergency departments
5. Establishing 60 respiratory screening points in hospitals and health centers 6- Providing the laboratory department with the equipment and consumables required to detect the disease 7. Providing personal protection equipment for medical personnel 8. Equipping the isolation centers and supplying them with the required equipment, medicines and consumables 9. Coordination of efforts between partners in the health sector

Supporting the health sector to help all those affected by the epidemic, providing the required health care for critical cases, in addition to providing isolation centers to prevent the spread of the epidemic
